attributes.action: Keep Highfields Primary School, Wellington Street, Long Eaton, Derbyshire Open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our school is a grade 11 listed building and was built almost 100yrs ago.The school is the heart of our community. Please help us to keep it for at least another 100yrs. The oldest ex pupil we have is 92 and the youngest pupil is 3.Let the 3year old visit the school when she is 92.Help us keep our heritage
